name: The Last Dive
description:
Hi there!

You are the baywatch appointed and there’s some kids drowning, but the things are not to easy, the people see some sharks around them and the birds in the sky are not helping to much, so the beach, the sea, the sun and me trust in your abilities to rescue all the kids in danger.
A game inspired by the beautiful colors of the beach and the water near the sun so close that almost touch. The memories and the confusion of the time spent on the beach when you are there.
Hope you like it, share with a friend and if you have more time, visit and support my other games <3  

This game is my first project with the game engine called Pocket Platformer (Click on the name to go) Its recommended play this game in Chrome or Brave navegator and for the moment is not avalible to play in smartphones.
